description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Number of lines per page varies. Written in black ink with use of red. European glazed paper with watermark. Fol. 7b-8a have a golden and black frame with an illuminated headpiece. Two pages are cut off between fol. 196 and 197. Inscriptions and ownership statements on fol. 1a. Title on the lower edge of the text block. Label pasted on the upper cover with the inscription in Arabic script "[...] 314". Label pasted on the pastedown of the upper cover with the inscription in Arabic script "Ḥ 471/2". Foliation in pencil using Western numerals. Text 10 ( Risālah fī ḥaqq abaway Rasūl Allāh ) was copied in 1131 H. (colophon, fol. 61a). The colophon of text 16 (ʻIddat asʼilah wa-ajwibah) adds the name of the copyist: al-Ḥājj Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj Ḥusayn al-Sāfirī (fol. 87b).
author: Niyazı̂, d. 1693 or 4.
abstract: Collection of texts in Arabic and Turkish, mostly on religious matters.
contents: 1. fol. 1a-2b: [Several inscriptions and short excerpts].
2. fol. 3a: [Table of contents, in violet ink by a later hand ].
3. fol. 7b-26a: Tasbīʻ li-Qaṣīdat al-Burdah / Muḥammad al-Malaṭī al-Miṣrī [Niyazî, d. 1693 or 4].
4. fol. 27a-31b: Īqāẓ al-nāʼimīn / Muḥammad Afandī al-Birkawī [Mehmet Efendi Birgivı̂, d. 1573].
5. fol. 31b-34a: [Commentary on a sentence from Īqāẓ al-nāʼimīn].
6. fol. 34b-38b: Naṣīḥat al-mulūk / [Mehmet Efendi Birgivı̂, d. 1573].
7. fol. 39a-49a: Radd wa-ibṭāl fatwá Abī al-Saʻūd / Muḥammad al-Birkawī [Mehmet Efendi Birgivı̂, d. 1573].
8. fol. 49b-52a: [Short treatise on samāʻ and dhikr] / [Muḥammad Abū al-Saʻūd, d. 1574 or 5].
9. fol. 52b-58a: [Short excerpts on blamable innovation, etc.].
10. fol. 58b-61a: Risālah fī ḥaqq abaway Rasūl Allāh / Ibn al-Kamāl al-wazīr [Kemalpaşazade, d. 1534].
11. fol. 61b-62b: Risālah fī ḥukm qirāʼāt āyat al-Kursī ʻaqīb kull ṣalāh / Muḥammad ibn Ḥamzah [al-Āydīnī, d. 1704 or 5].
12. fol. 62b-63a: [Short excerpts on the same topic].
13. fol. 63b-64a: Risālat Abī Saʻūd fī bayān lafẓ jalab / Abū Saʻūd Afandī [ Muḥammad Abū al-Saʻūd, d. 1574 or 5].
14. fol. 64b-65a: Risālah fī ḥukm al-taḥīyah bi-ghayr al-salām / Muḥammad al-Kūzalhiṣārī [al-Āydīnī, d. 1704 or 5].
15. fol. 65a-67b: [Short excerpts from several texts, mostly commentaries of the Qurʼān].
16. fol. 68a-87b: ʻIddat asʼilah wa-ajwibah / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Zurqānī (d. 1710).
17. fol. 88a-90a: [Short excerpts from several texts].
18. fol. 90b-95a: Risālah fī miʻrāj al-Rasūl [Selections from Mawāhib al-ladunīyah bi-al-minaḥ al-Muḥammadīyah] / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qasṭallānī (d. 1517 or 18).
19. fol. 95b-104a: [Short excerpts from several texts].
20. fol. 104b-107b: al-Aḥādīth allatī wuridat fī ḥaqq al-walīmah wa-ḥukmihā / ʻAlī al-Qārī [ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī, d. 1605 or 6].

21. fol. 108a-181a: [Short excerpts from several texts: Sharḥ dalāʼil al-khayrāt / Muḥammad al-Mahdī al-Fāsī (d. 1698); Mishkāt [ al-maṣābīḥ / Muḥammad Khaṭīb al-Tibrīzī (fl. 1337)] ; Kitāb ṣifat ṣāḥib al-dhawq, Tawārīkh al-khulafāʼ, Ḥuṣūl al-rifq bi-uṣūl al-rizq / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūtī (d. 1505); Ḥayāt al-ḥayawān / Muḥammad ibn Mūsá al-Damīrī (d. 1405); Kitāb al-arbaʻīn / Abū Ḥāmid al-Ghazzālī (d. 1111); Sharḥ al-Mishkāt / ʻAlī al-Qārī (d. 1605 or 6); Tanbīh al-ghāfilīn / Abū al-Layth [al-Samarqandī] (d. 983?); al-Qāḍī [al-Bayḍawī?] fī sūrat al-Baqarah, fī sūrat al-Nisāʼ, fī sūrat al-Nūr]; al-Bazāzīyah ... etc.].
22. fol. 181b-182a: Waṣīyat Abī Ḥanīfah li-tilmīdhihi Yūsuf ibn Khālid.
23. fol. 182b-183b: [Risālah fī al-ḥadr wa-al-jazm fī al-iqāmah].
24. fol. 184a-188b: [Blank].
25. fol. 189a: [Verses of poetry].
26. fol. 189b-191a: Maqālah / Kamāl Afandī [Kemalpaşazade?].
27. fol. 191a-195b: [Fatwas(?)] / Muḥammad Saʻd al-Dīn.
28. fol. 196a-b: Risālah fī al-kanāʼis al-Miṣrīyah / Zayn ibn Nujaym al-Ḥanafī [Zayn al-Dīn ibn Nujaym, d. 1563].
29. fol. 197a: [Short excerpts in Turkish].
extent: 197 leaves : paper ; 215 x 150 (143 x 65) mm. bound to 217 x 157 mm.
creator: Niyazı̂, d. 1693 or 4.
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Brown and yellow marbled paper over paper pasteboards for upper and lower covers and envelope flap. Red leather for spine and fore-edge flap. The same marbled paper is used for the doublure.
